premise_source_doc_sentence: Injustice 2 introduces a new feature called the Gear System , a loot-dropping system that rewards players with costume pieces and equipment that can be used to customize characters ' appearances and modify their abilities and stats .
Injustice 2 , a 2017 sequel of the first game
A sequel titled Injustice 2 was released in May 2017 .

Injustice 2 's storyline centers around Batman and his insurgency 's attempt to restore society after the fall of Superman 's regime ; however , the arrivals of the newly formed supervillain group `` The Society '' and the alien Brainiac force Batman to consider freeing the imprisoned Superman to help combat the threats .
Injustice 2 is a fighting video game developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. .
